subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Acie Law IV made four free throws in the final minute of a second-round game against Louisville, the final two, with 1.7 seconds remaining, sealing a victory for Texas A&M.
snippet: Acie Law IV made four free throws in the final minute of a second-round game against Louisville, the final two, with 1.7 seconds remaining, sealing a victory for Texas A&M.
